articles.title: NASA Finds Hidden Heat on Saturn’s Icy Moon Enceladus, Hinting at Life - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Cassini’s new analysis shows Saturn’s moon Enceladus leaking heat from both poles, not just the south. This balanced heat flow suggests its underground ocean could stay liquid for geological ages, supporting conditions for life. Scientists even used temperatu…
articles.content:
